entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 06:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning and 70 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
